title: 04/23/21 DPS Hour 2 Darren Rovell and Adam Lefkoe
itunes:title: 04/23/21 DPS Hour 2 Darren Rovell and Adam Lefkoe
description:
Ross Tucker is in for Dan today. Darren Rovell talks to Ross about the new jersey number rule in the NFL. Darren says players who trade jerseys at the end of games actually pay the teams for those jerseys. Adam Lefkoe tells Ross that the Lakers can still win the NBA title if Lebron James and Anthony Davis are healthy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Ross Tucker is in for Dan today. Darren Rovell talks to Ross about the new jersey number rule in the NFL. Darren says players who trade jerseys at the end of games actually pay the teams for those jerseys. Adam Lefkoe tells Ross that the Lakers can still win the NBA title if Lebron James and Anthony Davis are healthy.
